short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI powered smart blocker and filter to improve YouTube addiction.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Youtube Addiction Rehab is the first YouTube blocker that works on a "Content Level." It doesn't just block/unblock, but also provides the flexibility to allow you to control the algorithm.

<< Features >>

1️⃣ AI Goal Keeper
A smart blocker that stops you from wasting time on distracting content. Block videos that are not relevant to your goals.

2️⃣ AI Focus Filter
A smart filter that helps you focus on the important stuff. Hide anything that can be a distraction.

3️⃣ No Shorts!
Shorts are attention black holes. You have the option to hide them all.

Try it for free!


More info on https://www.youtubeaddiction.rehab/
Feedback form: https://forms.gle/t216Ro2w8auWH5vK8
